resources.title: PayU Latam Payment Gateway Configuration
resources.description: Configuration to integrate Oracle Commerce Cloud Service with the PayU Latam Payment Gateway.
resources.merchantIdHelpText: Your ID as merchant in the PayU Latam platform. Example: 508029
resources.accountIdHelpText: The ID of one of your accounts in the PayU Latam platform. Example: 512327
resources.paymentMethodsHelpText: Payment methods supported by the PayU Latam platform
